sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import dataSource from './DataSource' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import BlogContent from './BlogContent' import "../components/css/style.css"; import $ from 'jquery' class Blog extends Component { componentDidMount() { var $header = $('.header-animated'); var $headers = $('.header-animated opaque'); var $logoAlt = $header.find('.logo > img').data('logo-alt'); // white logo var $logoDefault = $header.find('.logo > img').data('logo-default'); // black logo $(".header").css("display", "block") if (window.location.pathname == "/features" || window.location.pathname == "/about" || window.location.pathname == "/blog") { $(".header").addClass("opaque"); $header.find('.logo > img').attr('src', $logoDefault); } else { $(".header").removeClass("opaque") } } render() { return ( <>
{ReactHtmlParser(aboutTeam)} {this.state.aboutState.data.entry.team_section.cta[0].title} {this.state.aboutState.data.entry.team_section.cta[1].title}
{ReactHtmlParser(promoteSection)}
{ReactHtmlParser(descriptionsub_content)}

{this.state.aboutState.data.entry.promote.store_section[0].title}

{this.state.aboutState.data.entry.promote.store_section[1].title}

{this.state.aboutState.data.entry.promote.store_section[2].title}

{ReactHtmlParser(testimonials)}

{this.state.aboutState.data.entry.testimonials[0].name}

{ dataSource.map((item, index) => { return ( <>

{item.title}

} /> ) }) }
) } } export default Blog
